Brothers and sisters .. Young people under the age of 25 represent about half of our Arab societies .. It is reasonable to be interested in them and their issues equal to this ratio
Youth have hopes and aspirations, issues and challenges .. And with them the rise of societies or collapse .. And on their hands accrues achievements .. or failures
I want to choose a young man or a woman under the age of 25 to represent young people's issues and aspirations. I want him as our minister in the UAE government
I ask our universities in the state to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women from each university who graduated in the last two years or in their last years to choose from them as minister

I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and aspirations as a UAE government Minister.
Youth representatives some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
Our young country was built by the hands and achievements of youth. Youth is our strength and speed and is our treasure for the future

PM statement to @HouseofCommons: I would like to make a Statement on Britain’s EU membership. #EUreform
PM: Europe is about working together to advance our shared prosperity & security, not about joining some kind of European superstate.
PM: We asked for commitments on European competitiveness, trade deals signed, the single market completed. These are in the draft texts.
PM: We are absolutely clear that Britain is going to keep the pound. There must be no discrimination against the pound.
PM: The draft represents the strongest package we have ever had on tackling the abuse of free movement & closing down back-door routes in.

#AoVivo Pronouncement to the Nation. Follow: https://t.co/KVXudJXrdJ #ZikaZero
I call on each of you to fight together against the spread of the mosquito that transmits the zika virus. #ZikaZero
The mosquito that transmits the zika virus may be in your neighbor's house. It can be in your house, as long as there are breeding sites. #ZikaZero
Until we develop a vaccine against the zika virus, we need to fight the mosquito. #ZikaZero
It is enough that we prevent the transmitting mosquito from reproducing in still waters. If the mosquito is not born, the zika virus can not live.
The government is putting all the necessary financial, technological and human resources into this fight in defense of life. #ZikaZero
On Saturday, the 13th, we will start a mega-operation involving 220,000 men and women from the military. #ZikaZero
We need the help and goodwill of everyone. Collaborate! Mobilize your family and community. #ZikaZero
I want to convey a special word of comfort to Brazilian women. #ZikaZero
Especially for moms and future moms: we will do everything, absolutely everything we can to protect them. #ZikaZero
We will do everything, absolutely everything, to support children affected by microcephaly and their families. #ZikaZero
Let's prove, once again, that Brazil is strong, has a conscious people, and will not be defeated by a mosquito and the virus it carries.
More than ever, Brazil needs our union! #ZikaZero
Watch the pronunciation: https://t.co/hoKtyO7jtn #ZikaZero
